<text>
<sentence id="9110" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="JJ">“The</word>
		<word type="NN">village</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NNP">Holcomb</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">stands</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">on</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="DT">the</word>
			<word type="JJ">high</word>
			<word type="NN">wheat</word>
			<word type="NNS">plains</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="JJ">western</word>
			<word type="NNP">Kansas</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=",">,</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">a</word>
		<word type="JJ">lonesome</word>
		<word type="NN">area</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">that</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="JJ">other</word>
			<word type="NNS">Kansans</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBP">call</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB">“out</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN">there.”</word>
	</chunk>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"
